ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: Fw: [Fwd: FW: FW: Disney deal]
ygData.msgSnippet: Be very careful with this kind of mail. They are called spams. They are made to saturate networks. And they could block servers in a company. If everybody send
ygData.messageBody:
Be very careful with this kind of mail. They are called spams.
They are made to saturate networks. And they could block servers in a
company. If everybody send a mail to 10 people, after n tries, you have 10^n
mails travelling on the network.
No people working seriously on computers would ever send such a message,
even Microsoft :o)
You will know next time. That's the way you learn. :o)

Erwin, Paladin of Tunare
Fennin Ro
